_source.text: A 66-year-old resident of Rocky River, Ohio, Patricia embodies the program's longevity better than anyone alive today, as the kidney she received from her mother at Cleveland Clinic in 1968 is still serving her well, 46 years later.

text: A 66-year-old resident of **Rocky** **River**, Ohio, Patricia embodies the program's longevity **better** **than** anyone
